sentence.text: Using a proteomics screen, we now show that the mitochondrial unfoldase-peptidase complex ATP metabolic processP associates with the oncoprotein protein phosphorylation and the respiratory chain Complex II subunit succinate dehydrogenase B (aerobic respiration) in mitochondria of tumor cells.

Deregulated mitochondrial respiration induced by ATP metabolic processP targeting causes oxidative stress, which in turn reduces tumor cell proliferation, suppresses cell motility, and abolishes metastatic dissemination in vivo.
proteolysis involved in cellular protein catabolic process is universally overexpressed in primary and metastatic human cancer, correlating with shortened patient survival.

entity.text: proteolysis involved in cellular protein catabolic process

sentence.text: Therefore, tumors exploit ATP metabolic processP-directed proteostasis to maintain mitochondrial bioenergetics, buffer oxidative stress, and enable metastatic competence.
